title: Pavaan Naam
content:
Verse 1
 Sa[Em]ri dunia [C]mein gung raha tere naam
Yeshu na[D]am 
Yeshu [Em]naam
 Sa[Em]ri bigdi bana [C]raha tera naam
 Yeshu na[D]am yeahu [Em]naam 
 Chorus
 Y[G]ougya hai tu [Am]yogya hai
 S[D]tuti Prasansa[G] ke
 Aur[Em] koi nahi [Am]kabhi nahi
 Ter[C]i jagha le s[D]akta hai
 Tere[C] pavan naam ke [D]main
 Jai jai k[C]ar karta[Em] hu
| Varse 2 |
 [Em]Aasmaan ke neche
 [C]Manushaw ke beech main
 [C]Koe aur naam nahi...
 [D]Koe aur naam nahi x2
 [C]Papo se deta [D]nasaam yeshu naam
 [Em]Har gunaho jo tod ta hai
 [C]Papo se deta [D]nasaam yeshu naam
 [G]Har gunaho jo tod ta hai
-------------------------------------

title: Sthuthi Karna Aaradhana Karna (Stuti karna)
content:
| Chorus |
Sthuthi Karna Aaradhana Karna
Mujhe Aanand Hai (x2)
Praarthanaa Aur Vachan Maanan Karna
Mujhe Aanand Hai (x2)
| Verse 1 |
Mere Dil Mein Yishu Masih Aaya
Mujhe Aanand Hai(x2)
Ye Duniyaa Na De Sake Vaisaa Aanand
Mujhe Aanand Hai (x2)
-------------------------------------
 https://chords-of-songs.vercel.app 
-------------------------------------
| Verse 2 |
Paapon Se Usne Mujhe Chhudaya
Mujhe Aanand Hai(x2)
Apne Laahu Se Dhokar Mujhe Shuddh Kiya
Mujhe Aanand Hai(x2)
| Varse 3 |
Uddhaar Kaa Maarg Mujhe Bataya
Mujhe Aanand Hai(x2)
Swarg Raajy Ka Vaaris Mujhe Banaya
Mujhe Aanand Hai (2)

title: Glorious Day
content:
| Verse 1|
I was [D]buried beneath my shame
Who could [Bm7]carry that kind of weight
It was my [Gsus2]tomb Till I[D] met You
I was [D]breathing but not alive
All my [Bm7]failures I tried to hide
It was my [Gsus2]tomb Till I[D] met You
You [Gsus2]called my name And I ran out of that [D]grave
| Chorus |
[D]Out of the [Gsus2]darkness Into Your glorio[D]us day
[D]You called my [Gsus2]name And I ran out of that[Bm7] grave
Out of the [Gsus2]darkness Into Your gloriou[D]s day
| Verse 2 |
Now Your [D]mercy has saved my soul
Now Your [Bm7]freedom is all I know
The old made [Gsus2]new, Jesus, when I[D] met You
You [Gsus2]called my name And I ran out of that [D]grave
| Chorus |
[D]Out of the [Gsus2]darkness Into Your glorio[D]us day
[D]You called my [Gsus2]name And I ran out of that[Bm7] grave
Out of the [Gsus2]darkness Into Your gloriou[D]s day
| Bridge |
[D]I needed rescue, My sin was heavy
[D]But chains break at the weight of Your glory
[D]I needed shelter, I was an orphan
[D]Now You call me a citizen of heaven
[D]When I was broken, You were my healing
[D]Now Your love is the air that I'm breathing
[Bm7]I have a future[Asus4], My eyes are open
'Cause when You called my [Gsus2]name
I ran out of that [D]grave
| Chorus |
[D]Out of the [Gsus2]darkness Into Your glorio[D]us day
[D]You called my [Gsus2]name And I ran out of that[Bm7] grave
Out of the [Gsus2]darkness Into Your gloriou[D]s day
-------------------------------------

title: Avarnit (Teri Stuti Prasansa Ho)
content:
| Chorus |
Teri [D]stuti prashansa[A] ho
Teri har pal mahima [D]ho

Tu [D]avarnit hai Tu [G]sundar hai
Mera [A]pehala pehala[D] pyaar hai
| Verse 1 |
Me[D]ri nirashao [A]mein
Meri aasha ba[D]na tu
Meri khamoshi[A]yon ko
Samajha tune pra[D]bhu
| Verse 2 |
D[D]il ki gaharaiyon [A]mein
Basata tu hi pr[D]abhu
Teri ichhaon [A]ko mai
Pura karta ch[D]alu
-------------------------------------

-------------------------------------

title: Tera Payar Hai Mahan
content:
| Chorus |
Tera [D]pyar hai mahaan
Tera [A]pyar hai yahaan
Main jo [D]pehlay murda[A] tha
Tu ne [D]dali mujh main jaan
Kyun na bolun phir main teri jai jai [A]kar
Kyun na bolun phir main teri jai jai [D]kar
Jai jai [G]kar jai jai[D] kar
Tu nay [A]mere liye kya kuch na k[D]iya
| Verse 1 |
Meri su[D]rat bigdi thi
Mera d[A]il tha khali
Tu nay si[G]ncha lahu say
Taake aaee har[D]yali
Kyun na bolun phir main teri jai jai k[A]ar...

| Verse 2 |
Apni r[D]uh say bhar diya
Apni sh[A]akti mujh ko di
Taake d[G]un main gawahi
Teri g[D]i uthnay ki
Kyun na boolun phir main teri jai jai k[A]ar...
| Verse 3 |
Aae j[D]iwan main khushi
Paai a[A]bdi zindgi
Tu hai zi[G]nda shafia
Tune y[D]eh hai Kiya
Kyun na boolun phir main teri jai jai k[A]ar...
-------------------------------------
